text: Diana Lancaster Taylor (born February 6, 1955) is an American businesswoman. She was the New York Superintendent of Banks from 2003 to 2007. Taylor was the First Lady of New York City from 2002 to 2013. She is the domestic partner of politician and businessperson Michael Bloomberg. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Connecticut Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:People from Greenwich, Connecticut
title: Diana Taylor (superintendent)
